oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1956-09-08 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from September 8, 1956. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Ferlin Husky (host/performer), guest performers the Louvin Brothers, and regular performers the Jordanaires, Dale Potter, Tommy Vaden, Del Wood, June Carter, and Chet Atkins. On this show, Ferlin Husky presents the Louvin Brothers with the Cashbox award for best new singing group, and the Country & Western Jamboree award for best sacred annual DJ poll. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: June Carter; Louvin Brothers; Chet Atkins; Ferlin Husky
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Comedy routine (June Carter, Ferlin Husky) -- Ferlin Husky presents the Louvin Brothers with awards from Cashbox and Country & Western Jamboree magazines -- That's All He's Asking Of Me (Louvin Brothers) -- Ferlin Husky introduces Chet Atkins -- Shine On Harvest Moon (Chet Atkins) -- Ferlin Husky talks -- Nothing Looks As Good As You (Ferlin Husky) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Ferlin Husky) -- Cavalier Cigarettes commercial -- Station announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Atkins, Chet; Wood, Del; Potter, Dale; Cash, June Carter, 1929-2003; Jordanaires (Musical group); Vaden, Tommy; Husky, Ferlin; Louvin Brothers; Louvin, Ira, 1924-1965; Louvin, Charlie, 1927-2011
